Pai Lotus & Organce Blossom Bioaffinity Tonic

Brand: Pai

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Aqua, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Water*, Nelumbo Nucifera Root Water, Lactobacillus Ferment, Glycerin**, Polylysine, Sodium Hydroxide, *From Organic Agriculture, **Made Using Organic Ingredients.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
